name: Kang Dayat Diikuti Oleh Hantu (Kang Dayat Followed By Ghost)
description:
This illustration tells about the figure of Kang Dayat who works as a local housing guard. One night he had to go around to ensure safety but without realizing it he had been followed by a wandering spirit who recently died of suicide due to not having a job during this pandemic.

Basic work using Chinese ink on paper and then working through digital media.
Infinite Loop Animation
IMAGE/GIF
1350 X 1912 PX
